snippet: Because of rules decided recently by the I.R.S., some workers could find family coverage all but impossible to obtain. Their best hope might be to ask their employers NOT to offer coverage.
abstract: Because of rules decided recently by the I.R.S., some workers could find family coverage all but impossible to obtain. Their best hope might be to ask their employers NOT to offer coverage.

headline.main: In the Affordable Care Act, Some Children Left Behind

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
